title: U.S. Seeks Removal of Iran From U.N. Women’s Rights Agency
description: At an informal meeting of the United Nations Security Council on Wednesday, the American ambassador called on the global community to give its “moral support” to protesters in Iran.
dc:creator: Farnaz Fassihi
category: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
media:description: Shirin Ebadi, an Iranian human rights lawyer and Nobel Peace Prize winner, addressing via a live video link an informal meeting of the United Nations Security Council on Wednesday, regarding the ongoing women-led protests in Iran.
